info.name: www.MapMyRun.com cleanup
info.description: Most ads removed and UI tidied up a little. Enjoy!
info.additionalInfo:
2011 Dec 7   - Updated to remove new ad locations.
2012 Jan 25  - Fix for "My Routes" content not showing up
2012 Jul 25 - Updated for 2012 site re-design
2012 Aug 2 - Minor fix for sidebar ad clickable regions
2012 Aug 15 - Move workout icon so it doesn't obscure user icon
2013 Feb 7 - Updated for 2013 site, hides some timed pop-overs and touts
2013 Mar 1 - Remove top ad area in mapping mode
